name: Save My Dreams (Demo)
description:
3D retro platformer with PS1 looking graphics

STORY

In this game you play as a tiger called Mars. He is a pet of princess Mia, but all her memories got stolen by evil magicians. And your task is to investigate Mia's dreams to restore her memories!

GAMEPLAY

To accomplish it you need to collect puzzle pieces that represent parts of memories. But it won't be easy, cause lots of enemies will fight tiger to stop him from doing so. You will need to avoid the obstacles, jump around, collect stuff and fight enemies.

CONTROLS

Tigers abilities: walk, run, jump and dash. GAMEPAD is supported fully and recommended to use. You can also manipulate camera by rotating it and entering the "view" mode.

CREDITS

everything from code to 3D models and music is made by Fewjix.
